nodes.bodyText:
I think this checkConfig is not proper for google style, but I do not find a way to add attribute to config like 
  
    
      checkstyle/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/NoWhitespaceBeforeCheckTest.java
    
    
         Line 76
      in
      11bb48a
    
    
    
    

        
          
           checkConfig.addAttribute("tokens", "DOT");

you do not need to update Test to add attribute, if you need such token - add it to google_checks.xml file.
Such tests do validation of google config as is, without any modification.
Such tests are not tests for Check, they are tests for exact config.
done, I get it
please move this token to config instance above, no need to have two instances.

nodes.bodyText: In issue I provided several usecases, please use them all and be creative and do even more, the weirder code the better.
done

please make Input like #6707 (comment)
We need more test cases.
done
// OK , please fix other lines

violation on 8.32
Should be "//ok".
done
please remove dot at the end of comment.
done
lowercase b in Between and please add the rule number that specifies where google allows it. I assume this is 4.6.2 point 9?

This comment should only be for ellipsis. We will have different comments for each tokens.
Please also update reasoning as described in next point.
done, I update according to the first comment, please give me more information about Please also update reasoning as described in next point.
ok ,I get it, done

@romani I am not seeing where it is saying this expected/allowed.
https://checkstyle.org/styleguides/google-java-style-20180523/javaguide.html#s4.6.2-horizontal-whitespace

a single ASCII space also appears in the following places only.
Between a type annotation and [] or ....

There is no type annotation here and guide specifically says space is ONLY allowed where google defined it. There is no type annotation here, so there should be a violation.
#6707 (comment)

there is no item for space between type and [], so It is ok to demand no space before ....

It seems we are in agreement then? Nothing I see says this will be fixed later.
I am expecting changes to the logic of the check to look for annotation or not as specified in #6707 (comment)

+package com.google.checkstyle.test.chapter4formatting.rule462horizontalwhitespace;
+
+import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
+import java.lang.annotation.Target;
+
+@Target(ElementType.TYPE_USE)
+@interface NonNull {
+
+}
+
+public class InputNoWhitespaceBeforeAnnotations {
+
+    public void foo(final char @NonNull [] param) {} // ok
+
+    @NonNull int @NonNull[] @NonNull[] fiel1; // OK until #8205

+

+    }

+    }

nodes.bodyText:
There is no type annotation here, so there should be a violation.

@rnveach, yes, you are right, I updated #8205 . We need to put here // ok until #8205.
@HuGanghui , please do the same for other similar cases.
We should remove token from Check config in google as it is error prone (it is better to not bother user with false-positives, no violation is much better for user experience).
We will do new Check for this to address validation properly.

I am expecting changes to the logic of the check to look for annotation or not as specified in

Lets move it #8205 , I think new Check should be created.
